title: When is the next Username Cleanup?
body: So does anyone know when the next username sweep/cleanup is? When old inactive low level accounts that don't have immunity have their name wiped so they're available for others to use or create?

replies.body:
I thought it was just when an account becomes six months unused.

On the [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-), it says
>    Levels 1-6: 6 months of inactivity immunity
    Level 12: 1 year of immunity
    Level 20: 1 year, 8 months of immunity
    Level 30: 2 years, 6 months of immunity

so I guess it depends on your level. You're level thirty, so you have two and a half years of immunity.
